# Environment

## Dataset

Data was saved in SPSS save file, imported to R

```{r}
pdcds0 <- read_sav("pdcsurvivalalter.sav")
pdcds0 %>% mutate_if(is.labelled, ~(as_factor(.))) %>% select(-c(DataID, Comorbidities)) %>% datatable(width = 1280, height = 720)
```
